trans-unit.source: Provides a control array of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> controls
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> 控件的控件数组

trans-unit.source: The `ToolStripMenuArray` class provides an equivalent for the run-time functionality of a Visual Basic 6.0 `Menu` array.
trans-unit.target: `ToolStripMenuArray`类提供了等效的运行时功能的 Visual Basic 6.0`Menu`数组。

trans-unit.source: It does not provide the design-time features of a Visual Basic 6.0 control array.
trans-unit.target: 它不提供的 Visual Basic 6.0 控件数组的设计时功能。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 函数和对象在<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripMenuItemArray" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripMenuItemArray" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: When you instantiate a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripMenuItemArray>, you must also call the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripMenuItemArray.SetIndex%2A> method to create the initial element in the array.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that determines whether a control is a member of a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ComboBoxArray" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值确定控件是否是 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ComboBoxArray" /> 的一个成员。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="target" /> is a member of the control array; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="target" /> 是控件数组的一个成员，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The `CanExtend` method can be used to determine whether a specific <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> control is the base element of the control array from which the other elements were cloned.
trans-unit.target: `CanExtend`方法可以用于确定是否可以使用特定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>控件是控件数组从其克隆其他元素的基本元素。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> in a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripMenuItemArray" /> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 在单击 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> 中的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripMenuItemArray" /> 时发生。

trans-unit.source: The `Click` event passes an <xref:System.EventArgs> to its event handler.
trans-unit.target: `Click`事件传递<xref:System.EventArgs>到其事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Therefore it only indicates that a click has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 因此它仅指示发生了单击操作。

trans-unit.source: If you need more specific mouse information (button, number of clicks, wheel rotation, or location), use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要更具体的鼠标信息 （按钮、 单击、 鼠标轮旋转或位置的数），使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick> event will not be raised if the click is caused by action other than that of the mouse, such as pressing the ENTER key.
trans-unit.target: 但是，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick>如果单击引起操作不是鼠标，如按 ENTER 键操作，将不会引发事件。

trans-unit.source: A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system.
trans-unit.target: 由用户的操作系统的鼠标设置确定一次双击。

trans-unit.source: The user can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that should be considered a double-click instead of two clicks.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以设置它认为是双击而不是两次单击鼠标按钮点击之间的时间。

trans-unit.source: The `Click` event is raised every time that a control is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: `Click`双击控件每次引发事件。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have event handlers for the `Click` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> events of a control, the `Click` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> events are raised when the control is double-clicked and both methods are called.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你有事件处理程序`Click`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>控件的事件`Click`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>时控件是双击和调用这两种方法将引发事件。

trans-unit.source: If a control is double-clicked and that control does not support the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> event, the `Click` event might be raised two times.
trans-unit.target: 如果双击控件时，控件不支持<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>事件，`Click`可能引发事件两次。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: A typical use of `MouseHover` is to display a tool tip when the mouse pauses on a control within a specified area around the control (the "hover rectangle").
trans-unit.target: 一个典型用途`MouseHover`是当鼠标悬停在控件 （"悬停矩形"） 周围的指定区域中控件上时显示工具提示。

trans-unit.source: The pause required for this event to be raised is specified in milliseconds by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 引发此事件所需的暂停指定以毫秒为单位通过<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The `MouseHover` event is defined and detected in connection with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A> properties.

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> is providing Help to accessibility applications.

trans-unit.source: You should use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> class to enable users to invoke Help on your accessible object by pressing the F1 key.
trans-unit.target: 应使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>类以使用户能够调用可访问对象的帮助，通过按 F1 键。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> gives you complete information in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>在为您提供的完整信息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> in the control array.
trans-unit.target: 控件数组中的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="Short" /> that represents the index of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Short" />，表示指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> 的索引。

trans-unit.source: Sets the index of the initial <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> in a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripMenuItemArray" />.
trans-unit.target: 设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> 中的初始 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripMenuItemArray" /> 的索引。

trans-unit.source: The `SetIndex` method should only be called when you are creating the initial element in the control array.
trans-unit.target: `SetIndex`控件数组中创建的初始元素时，仅应调用方法。

trans-unit.source: To add subsequent elements, call the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.Load%2A> method and specify the `Index`.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加后续元素，调用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.Load%2A>方法并指定`Index`。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> is a member of this <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripMenuItemArray" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> 是否为此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripMenuItemArray" /> 的成员。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="o" /> is a member of this control array; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="o" /> 是此控件数组的一个成员，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> is a member of a different <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripMenuItemArray>, `ShouldSerializeIndex` returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> 是另一个 <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripMenuItemArray> 的成员，`ShouldSerializeIndex` 则返回 `false`。
